Detailed Description

This class determines when photons are occluded by an entity.

See also:
PhotonOccluder

Member Function Documentation

float EntityPhotonOccluder::collides ( const Vector3 &  lightSourcePosition,
const Vector3 &  cameraPosition,
const LensEffect &  le 
) [virtual]

This method returns true if the given entity collides with a straight line between the light and the camera.

This method is a gross approximation only, that works just ok assuming you are hit-testing against a humanoid character

Parameters:
lightSourcePosition The matrix that represents the light's transform in world space.
cameraPosition The world position of the camera
le The lens effect in question (unused here)
Returns:
1 if there was no collision, else 0.

Implements PhotonOccluder.
